00018 #ifndef __Radiation_Input__
00019 #define __Radiation_Input__
00020 
00021 #include <vector>
00022 
00023 #include "BaseInput.h"
00024 
00025 class RadiationInput : public BaseInput
00026 {
00027 public: 
00028         vector<double> theta, phi;
00029         vector<double>  power_v, power_h, power_t;
00030         vector<double>  pol_axial_ratio, pol_tilt;
00031         string pol_sense; // ignore polarization sense
00032         vector<double> E_theta_mag, E_phi_mag;
00033         vector<double> E_theta_phase, E_phi_phase;
00034 
00035         long n_items;
00036         
00037         RadiationInput(istream& in_stream)
00038         {
00039                 n_items = 0;
00040                 
00041                 string searchString("RADIATION PATTERNS");
00042                 while (in_stream.good())
00043                 {
00044                         string line = readline(in_stream);
00045         
00046                         if (line.find(searchString,0) != string::npos)
00047                         {
00048                                 
00049                                 while (line.find("VOLTS/M",0) == string::npos)
00050                                         line = readline(in_stream);
00051         
00052                                 /*
00053                                 - - ANGLES - -           - POWER GAINS -       - - - POLARIZATION - - -    - - - E(THETA) - - -    - - - E(PHI) - - -
00054                                 THETA     PHI        VERT.   HOR.    TOTAL      AXIAL     TILT   SENSE     MAGNITUDE    PHASE     MAGNITUDE    PHASE
00055                                 DEGREES  DEGREES       DB      DB      DB        RATIO     DEG.              VOLTS/M    DEGREES      VOLTS/M    DEGREES
00056                                    .00      .00    -999.99   -3.23   -3.23     .00000   -90.00  LINEAR    0.00000E+00   -81.39    7.35700E-05  -195.64
00057                                 */
00058                                 line = readline(in_stream);
00059                                 
00060                                 while (line != "")
00061                                 {
00062                                         stringstream ss(line);
00063                                 
00064                                         theta.push_back(read_fixed(ss));
00065                                         phi.push_back(read_fixed(ss));
00066                                         power_v.push_back(read_fixed(ss)); 
00067                                         power_h.push_back(read_fixed(ss));
00068                                         power_t.push_back(read_fixed(ss));
00069                                         pol_axial_ratio.push_back(read_fixed(ss));
00070                                         pol_tilt.push_back(read_fixed(ss));
00071                                                                         
00072                                         ss >> pol_sense;
00073                                         
00074                                         E_theta_mag.push_back(read_sci(ss));
00075                                         E_theta_phase.push_back(read_fixed(ss));
00076         
00077                                         E_phi_mag.push_back(read_sci(ss));
00078                                         E_phi_phase.push_back(read_fixed(ss));
00079         
00080                                         line = readline(in_stream);                             
00081                                         n_items++;
00082                                 }
00083                                 cout << "Radiation pattern: " << n_items << " lines" << endl;
00084                         }       
00085                 }
00086         }
00087 
00088         bool equalto(const RadiationInput& ai)
00089         {
00090                 if (difference(ai) > 1e-4)
00091                         return false;
00092 
00093                 return true;
00094         }
00095 
00096         double difference(const RadiationInput& ai)
00097         {
00098                 double ret = 0.0;
00099                 // compart angles
00100                 if (n_items != ai.n_items)
00101                         return 1;
00102                 
00103                 for (long i=0; i < n_items;i++)
00104                 {
00105                         if (theta[i] != ai.theta[i])
00106                                 return 1;
00107                         if (phi[i] != ai.phi[i])
00108                                 return 1;
00109                                 
00110                         try
00111                         {
00112                                 ret += diff(power_v[i], ai.power_v[i]);
00113                                 ret += diff(power_h[i], ai.power_h[i]);
00114                                 ret += diff(power_t[i], ai.power_t[i]);
00115                                 ret += diff(pol_axial_ratio[i], ai.pol_axial_ratio[i]);
00116                                 ret += diff(pol_tilt[i], ai.pol_tilt[i]);
00117                         
00118                                 ret += diff(deg_polar(E_theta_mag[i],E_theta_phase[i]), deg_polar(ai.E_theta_mag[i],ai.E_theta_phase[i]));
00119                                 ret += diff(deg_polar(E_phi_mag[i],E_phi_phase[i]), deg_polar(ai.E_phi_mag[i],ai.E_phi_phase[i]));
00120                         }
00121                         catch (string message)
00122                         {
00123                                 cout << "Diff at [" << theta[i] << "," << phi[i] << "] : " << message << endl;
00124                         }
00125                 }
00126                 return  ret;
00127         };
00128 };
00129 
00130 #endif /* __Radiation_Input__ */
